verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:1
verses.text: At the end of every seven years thou shalt make a release.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:2
verses.text: And this is the manner of the release: Every creditor that lendeth ought unto his neighbour shall release it; he shall not exact it of his neighbour, or of his brother; because it is called the Lord’s release.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 15:3
verses.text: Of a foreigner thou mayest exact it again: but that which is thine with thy brother thine hand shall release;
